text: Penicillium herquei is an anamorph, filamentous species of the genus of Penicillium which produces citreorosein, emodin, hualyzin, herquline B, janthinone, citrinin and duclauxin,.ATCC ==Further reading== * * * * * * * * ==References== herquei Category:Fungi described in 1912
title: Penicillium herquei
